title: The Climate Summit's Agenda | Guests: Liz Wheeler & Salena Zito | 11/1/21
description:
Biden’s approval rating continues to plummet due to his instability, not his lack of radicalness. Liz Wheeler joins to discuss her bombshell story regarding the Navy and vaccine mandates. Justin Haskins, editorial director of the Heartland Institute, joins Glenn to discuss the radical policies promised at the climate summit in Glasgow. If you have your money with any of the seven banks joining forces with the climate change agenda, take your money out. Bill O’Reilly joins to clarify a controversial view he holds regarding the vaccine. Salena Zito, the national political reporter for the Washington Post, joins to give her insight on the Virginia governor race. Glenn takes calls from viewers to discuss Bill O’Reilly’s vaccine opinions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
